meanings.definition: A Japanese dish consisting of seafood or vegetables that have been battered and deep-fried.
meanings.sent1: I tried delicious tempuras at the Japanese restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The tempuras at the party were a big hit with everyone.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally dropped the tempuras on the floor, creating a funny moment.
meanings.sent4: The tempuras sizzled in the hot oil, turning golden and crispy.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly cooked tempuras filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: The batter used to coat food before frying.
meanings.sent1: The tempuras batter was light and crispy, perfect for frying.
meanings.sent2: She dipped the chicken in the tempuras before putting it in the oil.
meanings.sent3: The kids had a tempuras fight in the kitchen, creating a mess but lots of laughter.
meanings.sent4: The tempuras clung to the vegetables like a golden coat, ready for frying.
meanings.sent5: The secret to crispy tempuras lies in the perfect batter consistency.
